DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Trophy
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: This item was received as a trophy obtained in a bloody battle.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Ancient relic
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: This item was lost a long time ago, but was perfectly preserved and did not lose its unique properties.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Piece of art
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: This item was created by a truly great person who knows his job.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Common item
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Ordinary item, which was not difficult to find.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Artifact
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: This item has unprecedented properties and is able to change the balance of forces in favor of its owner.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Experimental
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: These prostheses were created using new production methods, which will reduce their price.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Homemade
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Created outside the necessary conditions, they significantly reduce their cost.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Damaged
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Created in inappropriate conditions, it was damaged, which affected its performance.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Broken
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Was seriously damaged during transportation.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Defective
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: This prosthesis was defective in production.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Рigh-quality
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: This instance was created in special conditions.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Improved
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: The improvement of production technologies has increased the strength of prostheses.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Supporting
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Allow you to increase your own strength, which affects the characteristics.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Prosthetic city guard
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Old prosthesis carved from the body of a dead defender.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Reinforced
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: The creator well strengthened the structure with anti-corrosion alloys.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Bloody
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Apparently, he was forcibly taken from the former owner.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: High strength
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: The use of expensive materials has increased the initial margin of safety.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Unknown person's organ
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: We cannot know exactly who this body part belonged to before.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Affected
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Judging by external signs, this organ can be seriously damaged.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Organ of a sick person
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: We can only guess what the owner of this organ suffered in life.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Freshest
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: As you can see, it was mined recently.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Perfect healthy
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Part of the body retained perfect proportions and overall performance.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Broken
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: The fragments from this building were scattered around, giving it a depressing look.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Ancient
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Lost long ago, she preserved the extraordinary beauty of antiquity.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Old fashioned
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Despite the old style, she did not lose her splendor.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Ruined
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: She cannot boast of being well preserved.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Lost
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: The long-lost miracle of creative thought continues to shine and delight others.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Ordinary
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Unremarkable construction created on the conveyor.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Perfect
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Created by amazing master.

DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.label: Mysterious
DarkNET.PriceModificatorDef.description: Embodied by an unknown master, which gives mystery.
